OOC: Ok, here's another one of my chars COMPLETELY IGNORED.  Read this part=
 from my post with Skullgrin, and then Robo, post damage with HR.
~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Skullgrin transformed to robot mode, then, he =
began a transformation.  He transformed into Pretender mode, and had his do=
uble slagmaker laser ready to be used on something.  In Pretender mode, he =
was 12 feet tall and had brute strength, but his intelligence dropped great=
ly.  He fired 2 rounds from his deadly slagmaker(I like calling it the slag=
maker ok?) at Hot Rod.
